data.persona: I am the king of the realm. I will conquer all the land I can see. I need the land to feed my subjects.
data.description:
You are in the Castle.
The inside of the castle is made from grey brick. All the floors are made from gold and silver. The castle is lit by lights as well as some candles.
There's a dinner, a grey brick, a candle, a light, a king, and a Tapestry here.
The horse is here.

You are carrying a cape, and wearing a crown.

data.mid_motivation: I am preparing to give the court an address
data.long_motivation: I must raise the kingdom's hopes and ensure them the end of the war is near
